options.text: Multiple primary breast cancers (synchronous or metachronous)
≥1 close blood relative with breast, ovarian, pancreatic or prostate cancer at any age
Breast cancer at age ≤50 y or male breast cancer at any age
Metastatic, intraductal/cribriform histology, or high- or very-high risk group
To aid in systemic treatment decisions using PARP inhibitors for breast cancer in the metastatic setting
To aid in adjuvant treatment decisions with olaparib for high-risk, HER-2 negative breast cancer
Lobular breast cancer with personal or family history of diffuse gastric cancer
≥ close blood relative with male breast cancer
